menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.description: The awesome foursome!sizzling and juicy golden corn, yummy black olives, crunchy capsicum, and spicy/tangy red paprika

menu.name: Black Tea
menu.description: dark reddish-gold hue, a hearty, slightly astringent flavor, and a moderate amount of caffeine

menu.name: Tomato Soup
menu.description: comforting classic for a reason: it's pretty and creamy; it's tangy and rich

menu.name: Manchow Soup
menu.description: vegetables, scallions, and chicken, thickened with broth and corn flour, and flavored with generous doses of soy sauce, salt, garlic, chili peppers and, predominantly, ginger.

menu.name: Cream Soup
menu.description: Distinct flavor of the main ingredient (asparagus in cream of asparagus, etc.). No starchy taste from uncooked roux. .

menu.name: Minestrone Soup
menu.description: beans, onions, celery, carrots, stock, and tomatoes,minestrone, since it is usually made out of whatever vegetables are in season.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: a salad of romaine lettuce tossed with an olive oil dressing, a coddled or raw egg, garlic, and grated cheese and topped with croutons and sometimes anchovies

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: salad of juicy tomatoes, crisp cucumber, sliced red onion, green pepper, crumbly feta cheese and plump Kalamata olives

menu.name: Vegetable Salad
menu.description: marinated or sauced mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables,tomatoes, green beans, cucumbers, beets, and mushrooms

menu.name: Garlic Bread
menu.description: topped with garlic and olive oil or butter and may include additional herbs, such as oregano or chives

menu.name: Veggie Wrap
menu.description: edamame, spinach, avocado, carrot, cucumber, and any other desired vegetables. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper, to taste

menu.name: Momos
menu.description: bite-size dumplings made with a spoonful of stuffing wrapped in dough,Meat or vegetables fillings becomes succulent as it produces an intensively flavored broth sealed inside the wrappers

menu.name: Spring Roll
menu.description: rice paper, or sometimes wheat-and-egg dough, filled with a shredded mixture of vegetables and often meat or seafood, served fresh or deep-fried

menu.name: Sandwich
menu.description: flat round mass of minced meat or vegetables, which is fried and often eaten in a bread roll

menu.name: Pizza
menu.description: dish of Italian origin consisting of a flattened disk of bread dough topped with some combination of olive oil, oregano, tomato, olives, mozzarella or other cheese, and many other ingredients

menu.name: Noodles
menu.description: bright creamy white or bright yellow color and firm texture,made from hard wheat flours

menu.name: Sushi
menu.description: staple rice dish of Japanese cuisine, consisting of cooked rice flavoured with vinegar and a variety of vegetable, egg, or raw seafood garnishes and served cold

menu.name: Pasta
menu.description: made from a mixture of flour, eggs, and water that is formed into different shapes and then boiled. Spaghetti, macaroni,noodles

menu.name: Pastry
menu.description: a sweet dessert baked mainly from wheat flour, water, and fat,mixing flour, sugar, eggs, and other ingredients

menu.name: Chocolate Waffle
menu.description: golden-brown in color, with a crispy outer texture and a soft interior, hot plates of a waffle iron, patterned

menu.name: Donuts
menu.description: sweetened or, sometimes, unsweetened dough fried in deep fat, typically shaped like a ring or, when prepared with a filling, a ball

menu.name: Icecream
menu.description: rich, sweet, creamy frozen food made from variously flavored cream and milk products churned or stirred to a smooth consistency during the freezing process and often containing gelatin, eggs, fruits, nuts, etc

menu.name: Chocolate Milkshake
menu.description: hocolate milkshake is an exceptional treat, topped with a nice dollop of whipped cream
